description:
2000 Tournament of Champions quarterfinal game 2.

From the Atlanta Civic Center.

final_jeopardy.answer_text: Princess Diana or The Virgin Mary
final_jeopardy.clue_text: 1 of the 2 women who've appeared the most on the cover of Time Magazine, they're separated by 2,000 years

title: Show #3622 - Tuesday, May 9, 2000
